## Code Quality Checklist

<!-- Verify your code meets our standards -->

- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards
- [ ] I have used modern C# 14 features where appropriate
- [ ] I have added XML documentation comments to new public methods
- [ ] My code includes parameter and return value descriptions
- [ ] I have included code examples in documentation where helpful
- [ ] My code handles null cases appropriately
- [ ] I have considered performance implications
- [ ] Methods are focused and single-purpose
